logP's were computed using a multiple linear regression trained on a training set composed of
99 molecules with known logP values. The solute descriptors were the computed dimensionless solvation free energy
of the solute in water and 1-octanol at infinite dilution at 298 K and 1 bar
computed using the SM8 solvation model as implemented in Q-Chem.

all the molecules were also found to have multiple aromatic rings within their structure. From these observations
